my.project.nostalgia.adapters

Class RecyclerViewGalleryAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter
      • my.project.nostalgia.adapters.RecyclerViewGalleryAdapter

  • public class RecyclerViewGalleryAdapter
extends androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter
    Setting up the gridLayout: images and videos.
    Gets images from Bitmap decoder and videos from Uris

      • onBindViewHolder

        public void onBindViewHolder(@NonNull
                             androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.ViewHolder holder,
                             int position)
        Binds video or image depending on what type of item it is. If video, sets video using its Uri. If image, uses Bitmap to set from filepath.
        Specified by:
